data.text: Mlonje malumbo kwa Mkulu Nguluwi, mliwikule itagwa lya heye,
Mumwimbile heye, mumwimbile heye lutogo,
Lutogo kwa itagwa lya heye lyelile,
Mpale Mkulu Nguluwi na mong'ho wa heye,
Hemwe walelwa wa Abulahamu chitumagwa wa heye,
Heye ndo Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hetwe,
Heye kangulikumbuchilaga ilagano lya heye mazuwa gose,
Kangubatililaga ilagano lyoyaliditile na Abulahamu
Nakamtawizila Yakobo kulagana kwa heye kota ndo ilajizo,
Nakalonga, “Ndowapani isi ya Kanaani,
Lowawele wachefu na walinguwazika,
nawalubaluba kulawa honhu hamwe mbaka hayage,
Ila Nguluwi hakundile ne munhu yawabunze,
“Mleche kuwadoliza wabakalizwe mafuta wa heni,
Nguluwi nakambuza lufemba kuli isi ya hewo,
Ila nakawalongolezela munhu yumwe,
Nawamuwopa magulu kwa minyololo
mbaka choyalonjile Yusufu vyochenele,
Mndewa wa Misili nakalajiza yadoholigwe,
Nakamuwika yalongoze undewa wa heye
yawalongoze vilongozi wa heye vyoyalingugana,
Aho ndo Isilaeli nakenjila Misili,
Mkulu Nguluwi nakawadita wanhu wa heye waponde lukami,
Nakawadita Wamisili wawazudile wanhu wa heye,
Hamba nakamlajiza Musa chitumagwa wa heye,
Nawadita ulajilo wa Nguluwi hali Wamisili,
Nguluwi nakegala jiza mchanya mwa isi,
Nakagalula mazi ga nzanda za hewo nagawa danda,
Mibula najiivaba isi ya hewo,
Nguluwi nakalonga, navyuya vilundo vya ng'honzi
Nakagalula nhonya ya hewo iwe nhonya ya maganga
nakajiwifya mizabibu na mitini ja hewo,
Nguluwi nakalonga na nzije nazilawila,
nazijigubika mizuchila jeng'ha kuli isi,
Nakawakopola walelwa wa mwaluko kuli isi ya hewo,
Hamba nakawalavya wanhu wa Isilaeli kuli isi,
Wamisili nawasangalala kuka kwa hewo,
Nguluwi nakawika ng'hungugu kota chigubiko mchanya wa wanhu wa heye
Nawalanda naye nakawegalila ng'hwale,
Loyatulile italawe mazi nagalawa,
Nakakumbuchila kulagana kwa heye kwelile,
Lelo nakawalavya wanhu wa heye kuli isi kwa kusangalala,
Nakawapa isi za wanhu wanji,
leka wanhu wa heye wahulichize mizilo ja heye,
